title: Verify  Personal Pickup type Delivery Method Context ActionType display with Guest Checkout

custom_steps_separated.content:
1.Login PV
2.Select "Personal Pickup type" Delivery Method
3.Slect supplier specific contexts
4.click Actions
5.verify user can Include Guest Checkout
custom_steps_separated.expected: application should allow user to include Guest Checkout in Action Context

title: Verify only  PERSONAL_PICKUP deliver methods  returned at the lock seats response
custom_preconds:
Create a "PERSONAL_PICKUP" delivery method with Guest Checkout
a. Login PV
b. Select "Personal Pickup type" Delivery Method
c. Select supplier specific contexts
d. click Actions
e. verify user can Include Guest Checkout

custom_steps_separated.content:
1.Launch Postman tool
2.Select the method as Post
3.Enter Authorization and Header details
4.Run V2 Lockseats API without patron ID
custom_steps_separated.expected: only PERSONAL_PICKUP deliver methods should  returned in API response

title: Verify only  PERSONAL_PICKUP deliver methods  returned at the Get cart  response

a. Login PV
b. Select "Personal Pickup type" Delivery Method
c. Select supplier specific contexts
d. click Actions
e. verify user can Include Guest Checkout

2.Run Lock seat API

custom_steps_separated.content:
1.Launch Postman tool
2.Select the method as Post
3.Enter Authorization and Header details
4.Run V2 get Carts API without patron ID

https://ph31mldvapppvn10.back.tickets.com:18443/api/v2/carts/346036035
custom_steps_separated.expected: only PERSONAL_PICKUP deliver methods should returned in API response

title: Verify Delivery methods where the ContextActionType setup allowed for GUEST_CHECKOUT not displayed in Lock seats response
custom_preconds:
Precondition1:
Create a "PERSONAL_PICKUP" delivery method with Guest Checkout
a. Login PV
b. Select "Personal Pickup type" Delivery Method
c. Select supplier specific contexts
d. click Actions
e. Include Guest Checkout


Precondition2:
Create a "PERSONAL_PICKUP" delivery method with Guest Checkout
a. Login PV
b. Select "Personal Pickup type" Delivery Method
c. Select supplier specific contexts
d. click Actions
e. Exclude Guest Checkout

custom_steps_separated.content:
1.Launch Postman tool
2.Select the method as Post
3.Enter Authorization and Header details
4.Run V2 Lockseats API without patron ID
custom_steps_separated.expected: only PERSONAL_PICKUP deliver method with Guest Checkout should returned in API response

title: Verify  Credit_Card type Payment Method can be setup as application property for guest.checkout.allowed.payment.types

custom_steps_separated.content:
1.Login to PV
2.Set application property guest.checkout.allowed.payment.types as CREDIT_CARD
custom_steps_separated.expected: The application property should be created

title: Verify different  allowed Payment Methods can be setup as application property for guest.checkout.allowed.payment.types

custom_steps_separated.content:
1.Login to PV
2.Set application property guest.checkout.allowed.payment.types as CREDIT_CARD,GIFT_CARD,ACCOUNT_CREDIT,PAYMENT_VOUCHER,PAYPAL
custom_steps_separated.expected: The application should allow user to add the comma separated list to the application property

title: Verify different Payment Methods can be added to the allowed list of Payment Methods on application property for guest.checkout.allowed.payment.types without throwing an error

custom_steps_separated.content:
1.Login to PV
2.Set application property guest.checkout.allowed.payment.types as CREDIT_CARD,GIFT_CARD,ACCOUNT_CREDIT,PAYMENT_VOUCHER,PAYPAL,abc,123,GHK%^&
custom_steps_separated.expected: The application should ignore the payment methods that are not allowed (other than CREDIT_CARD,GIFT_CARD,ACCOUNT_CREDIT,PAYMENT_VOUCHER,PAYPAL ) and not throw an error

title: Verify only Credit_Card type Payment Method  returned at the lock seats response when there is no patron in the lock payload

3.Enter Authorization and Header details
4.Run V2 Lockseats API without patron ID

title: Guest Checkout Test with Quotas enabled and loyalty points awarding for event
custom_preconds:
Set the Guest Checkout property in PV
Set the Event Quota property in PV 
Create ESD setup and associate ESD setup to the Event
Create Loyalty Program setup and associate loyalty program to the event 
Setup quota on the event

custom_steps_separated.content:
Precondition1: Set the Guest Checkout property in PV
-Navigate to System Setup--> System Administration
- Click Application Properties & set below property

guest.checkout.allowed.delivery.types PERSONAL_PICKUP
guest.checkout.allowed.payment.types CREDIT_CARD
custom_steps_separated.expected: New Event created successfully with Guest checkout Property

custom_steps_separated.content:
Precondition2: Set the event quota property in PV
-Navigate to System Setup--> System Administration
- Click Application Properties & set below property

event.ticket.quota.features.enabled TRUE
custom_steps_separated.expected: The event quota property should be setup

custom_steps_separated.content:
Precondition3: Create ESD setup and associate with event 

1.Navigate Supplier Admin->select Configuration tab
2.Select Extended Seat Group from Select Configuration dropdown
3.Create a new Extended Seat Group with Definition type as "Quota Enabled"
4.Select Extended Seat Definitions from Select Configuration dropdown
9.create a new Extended Seat Definition using this new Extended Seat Group
Launch PV application.
Login using valid credentials.
Navigate to Venue Administration and select supplier
click on Designer button to select the map
Select Extended seat from Dropdown
Click on new to create new Extended Seat Configuration
Map seats to Extended Seat Definition
Navigate to Venue config tab to select venue configuration
Associate Extended Seat configuration to Venue configuration
Navigate to event Administration, click on New to create new event
Select Master configuration and Venue configuration as created above
custom_steps_separated.expected: The setup should be successfully created and associated with event

custom_steps_separated.content:
Precondition4: Create Loyalty Program setup and associate loyalty program to the event 

Navigate to Loyalty Administration and Create a Loyalty Program with active Status  
Add qualifying groups 
Associate Loyalty Program with event created above
custom_steps_separated.expected: The Loyalty Program and Qualifying Group should be associated with the event

custom_steps_separated.content:
Precondition 4 : Set up quota on the event 
Navigate to the event > Event Ticket Quota tab 
Set up event quota and choose the quota esd created above
custom_steps_separated.expected: The event quota should be successfully set up on saving

custom_steps_separated.content:
Launch Postman tool
Set the header function Context as GUEST_CHECKOUT  
Select the method as Post
Run Generate session JWT

https://dev.pvapi.provenue.com/v2/b2c/jwt

{
    "orgId":48617,
    "agencyId":"MLB_MPV"
}
custom_steps_separated.expected: JWT session should generate successfully

Lock seats should complete successfully 
Verify below values displayed as expected in Response
-cart Id
-Cart Balance
-Available Delivery methods (Only credit card)
-Available Payment methods (Only personal Pickup delivery)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Launch Postman tool
Set the header function Context as GUEST_CHECKOUT  & x-sessiontoken
Select the method as GET
Run Get Cart v2 API 

https://dev.pvapi.provenue.com/v2/b2c/carts/{{cartId}}
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Verify below values displayed as expected in Response
-cart Id
-Cart Balance
-Available Delivery methods (Only credit card)
-Available Payment methods (Only personal Pickup delivery)

Cart checkout should complete successfully
Verify below values displayed as expected in Response
-Order Id
-AttendingPatronAccount
-Patron Accounts

custom_steps_separated.content:
Verify the transaction details in PV ticket services
-Login PV application
-Navigate to Ticketing
-Select Ticket services
-search with the order id
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The transaction details should displayed in PV 
-Patron Account created successfully

custom_steps_separated.content:
Verify Loyalty Points awarded to the patron On Patron details 
- Navigate to Ticketing > Patron Management 
- Look up with the Patron ID created in the checkout call response above 
- Check Loyalty tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: The loyalty program should be displayed along with the qualifying group and the loyalty points earned

title: Parking upsell for event via guest checkout
custom_preconds:
Set the Guest Checkout property in PV
Create few regular events and parking events
create 2 event groups one for regular event and one for parking events and assign the event accordingly(needed for setting up the upse1l via the below DB queries)
the attached queries were user for load environment but can be reused with modification for any environment

custom_steps_separated.content:
Precondition1: Set the Guest Checkout property in PV
-Navigate to System Setup--> System Administration
- Click Application Properties & set below property

guest.checkout.allowed.delivery.types PERSONAL_PICKUP
guest.checkout.allowed.payment.types CREDIT_CARD
custom_steps_separated.expected: New Event created successfully with Guest checkout Property

custom_steps_separated.content:
Precondition2 : Set the Upsell property in PV
-Navigate to System Setup--> System Administration
- Click Application Properties & set below property

upsell.features.enabled : TRUE
custom_steps_separated.expected: The property should be successfully set

custom_steps_separated.content:
Shirisha:This is not needed for simple upsell
Precondition 3 :Venue Setup for upsell Set a trigger event for upsell
Ticketing Setup > Supplier Administration
Create an Upsell Extended Seat Group 
Create two  Extended Seat Definitions.

Navigate to Venue Admin 
Choose MASTER CONFIRURATION from supplier 
Select DESGINER
Change SEAT MAP to EXTENDED SEAT and create new 
Add the newly created extended seat configuration to the venue configuration on the section 
Save changes

Add the Extended Seat Configuration the Venue Configuration by clicking on the MAGNIGYING GLASS icon and selecting the extended seat configuration that has been created
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Shirisha:This is not needed for simple upsell
The venue should have the ESD set up as required for the upsell

custom_steps_separated.content:
Shirisha:This is not needed for simple upsell
Precondition 3 : Set a trigger event for upsell
Create a new event from event admin 
Highlight the Extended Seat Configuration and save 
Navigate to Event Access
On the General option , choose the user as baseball_singles_mpv 
Select the Extended Seat Configuration from the Filter Available Seats dropdown list.
Select the type of offer from Automatic Multiple Offers. . i.e. Upsell

Save
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Shirisha:This is not needed for simple upsell
The event should be created with the required settings in place

custom_steps_separated.content:
Precondition 4 : 
create 2 event or use existing
a regular event and parking event
create event group: Supplier-> event group and select event group option in the dropdown
select New(create 2 of them)
goto EVENTS INCLUDED IN GROUP with the create event group- select the event we created into each of the groups.
these will used as the source and target for trigger in the attached query.
Set a target Parking event for upsell
custom_steps_separated.expected: event groups created and available for the SQL query insert in to the DB

The Add offer call should be successful and the following values should be displayed in the response 
-Cart Id 
-Cart Balance
-Both offer id's

Cart checkout should complete successfully

-Order Id
-AttendingPatronAccount
-Patron Accounts

Verify the transaction details in PV ticket services
-Login PV application
-Navigate to Ticketing

The transaction details should displayed in PV 
-Patron Account created successfully

title: RCG enabled Guest Checkout Test
custom_preconds:
- Set the Guest Checkout property in PV
- Create RCG setup
- Associate RCG setup to the Event

custom_steps_separated.content:
Precondition1: Set the Guest Checkout property in PV
-Navigate to System Setup--> System Administration
- Click Application Properties & set below property

guest.checkout.allowed.delivery.types    PERSONAL_PICKUP
guest.checkout.allowed.payment.types     CREDIT_CARD
custom_steps_separated.expected: Event created successfully with Guest checkout Property

custom_steps_separated.content:
Precondition2:
-Login PV
-Navigate System Setup-->Organization
-Navigate to configuration
-Choose "Regional Control Group" in Select Configuration
-Click New Enter the Mandatory fields 
  .Set the Regional Control lines(Country Code/Sub Country Code/Postal Codes)
-Click Apply changes
custom_steps_separated.expected: Regional Control Groups created successfully

custom_steps_separated.content:
Precondition3: Associate RCG setup to the Event
-Create a new event
- Click to Event Access
- Select "Transaction Types and Dates"
- Set the Precondtion2 Regional Control Group 
- Click apply changes

Launch Postman tool
Set the header function Context as GUEST_CHECKOUT  
Select the method as Post
Run Generate session JWT

https://dev.pvapi.provenue.com/v2/b2c/jwt

{
    "orgId":48617,
    "agencyId":"MLB_MPV"
}

Lock seats should complete successfully 
Verify below values displayed as expected in Response
-cart Id
-Cart Balance
-Available Delivery methods (Only credit card)
-Available Payment methods (Only personal Pickup delivery)
